text: Zdravko Popović (born 2 January 1983) is a Croatian footballer who plays as Forward. ==Club career== He joined AEK in 2013, signing a 2-year contract,sport24.gr/football/omades/Aek/anakoinwse-popovits-gia-thn-epithesh- h-aek.2385625.html after playing for Simurq PFC in Azerbaijan Premier League. His former clubs include NK Zagreb, NK Croatia Sesvete, OFI Crete and Levadiakos.
